abstract: Ethiopians take first and second place in both men's and women's divisions of Rome Marathon, with Abebe Degefa finishing in 2 hours 12 minutes 23 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Abebe Degefa of Ethiopia won the rain-soaked Rome Marathon, finishing in 2 hours 12 minutes 23 seconds to defeat his compatriot Bhirhanu Addis by nine seconds.
snippet: Abebe Degefa of Ethiopia won the rain-soaked Rome Marathon, finishing in 2 hours 12 minutes 23 seconds to defeat his compatriot Bhirhanu Addis by nine seconds.
